solution_line_template: It takes her {hours_per_painting} hours to paint 1 picture and she needs to paint {num_paintings} pictures so it will take {hours_per_painting}*{num_paintings} = <<{hours_per_painting}*{num_paintings}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours
Dawn will make ${total_earnings}.00 for {total_hours} hours of work which means she makes {total_earnings}/{total_hours} = ${earnings_per_hour}.00 per hour of work
